item.title: 观看直播：ABC 新闻直播间提供当天的头条新闻和最新报道，现在即可观看。
item.description: WATCH LIVE: ABC News Live has the day's top stories and up-to-the-minute reports, streaming now. trib.al/WIbz4t5

item.title:
当肯塔基州的一名校车司机把车开到一名学生的校车停靠站时，他看到这名一年级学生很沮丧。
当他发现是因为这个小男孩没有为睡衣日准备衣服时，司机知道下一步该怎么做了。
item.description:
When a Kentucky school bus driver pulled up to a student's bus stop, he saw the first-grader was upset.

When he found out it was because the young boy didn’t have an outfit for pajama day, the driver knew just what to do next.

trib.al/EWFHU7X

item.title:
"周日晚，克里斯托弗-诺兰（Christopher Nolan）、西里安-墨菲（Cillian Murphy）和小罗伯特-唐尼（Robert Downy Jr.
以下是您可能错过的所有奖项：
item.description:
"Oppenheimer" swept at the star-studded 2024 BAFTAs, as Christopher Nolan, Cillian Murphy and Robert Downy Jr. all took home wins Sunday night.

Here's everything you might have missed: trib.al/D0PlwjU

item.title: 梵蒂冈的秘密守护者即将退休。他想告诉你的是
item.description: The keeper of the Vatican’s secrets is retiring. Here’s what he wants you to know: trib.al/DRc5bn1

item.title: 法国天文学家瓦莱里-莱尼（Valéry Lainey）和巴黎天文台的一个研究小组宣布发现了米马斯新形成的海洋。
item.description: French astronomer Valéry Lainey and a team of researchers from Observatoire de Paris announced the discovery of Mimas' newly formed ocean. trib.al/7Wk8gZR

item.title: 由于世界上游客最多的景点之一埃菲尔铁塔因财务管理不善而举行罢工，周一参观埃菲尔铁塔的游客被拒之门外。
item.description: Visitors to the Eiffel Tower were turned away on Monday because of a strike over poor financial management at one of the world’s most-visited sites. trib.al/TTVUMXP

item.title:
加利福尼亚州从尤里卡市到圣地亚哥市的海岸线上，约有 3700 万人仍处于洪水警戒状态。
最新预测
item.description:
Some 37 million people remain on alert for flooding in California, spanning the coast from the cities of Eureka to San Diego.

LATEST FORECAST: trib.al/9niQR51

item.title:
已故俄罗斯反对派领袖阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼的妻子尤利娅-纳瓦尔娜娅周一发誓要继续已故丈夫的工作。
更多信息
item.description:
Yulia Navalnaya, wife of late Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny, vowed on Monday to continue the work of her late husband.

Read more: trib.al/9mYdLd6

item.title: 艾玛-斯通（Emma Stone）、玛戈-罗比（Margot Robbie）、西里安-墨菲（Cillian Murphy）和布莱德利-库珀（Bradley Cooper）等明星在伦敦英国电影电视学院奖颁奖典礼上走红毯。
item.description: Stars including Emma Stone, Margot Robbie, Cillian Murphy and Bradley Cooper walk the red carpet at the British Academy of Film and Television Awards in London. trib.al/nIGW8LM

item.title:
新消息：已故俄罗斯反对派领袖阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼的妻子尤利娅-纳瓦尔娜娅周一发誓要继续已故丈夫的工作。
"她在一段视频信息中说："除了我们自己，没有人会保护我们。
item.description:
NEW: Yulia Navalnaya, wife of late Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny, vowed on Monday to continue the work of her late husband.

"No one will protect us except ourselves," she said in a video message. trib.al/zyMffR2

item.title: 一位知名变性活动家在纽约大教堂举行的葬礼引起了一位教会高级官员的谴责，他称这场弥撒是美国天主教中最重要的礼拜堂之一的丑闻。
item.description: The funeral of a renowned transgender activist in a New York cathedral elicited a denunciation of the event by a senior church official, who called the mass a scandal within one of the preeminent houses of worship in U.S. Catholicism. trib.al/IPhggWC

item.title: 新泽西州的一位女士肩负着一项使命，那就是为那些可能不了解或不知道有这么多历史悠久的黑人大学为今天的学生服务的学生们带来黑人大学的体验。
item.description: A New Jersey woman is on a mission to bring the HBCU experience to students who might not know about or realize the many historically Black colleges and universities serving students today. trib.al/50KLGif

item.title: 经过五年的寻找和 50 年的失踪，保罗-麦卡特尼（Paul McCartney）终于与他那把独特的小提琴形状的 1961 年电动 Höfner 重逢，这把音乐史上的标志性乐器估计价值约 1,260 万美元。
item.description: After a five-year search — and 50 years missing — Paul McCartney has finally been reunited with his distinctive violin-shaped 1961 electric Höfner, an iconic piece of musical history estimated to be worth roughly $12.6 million. trib.al/ovIWski

item.title:
最新消息：以色列国防军周一上午表示，其地面部队和特种部队正在加沙地带南部城市汗尤尼斯西部 "继续开展行动"。
有关以色列-哈马斯冲突的更多信息，请访问
item.description:
LATEST: The Israel Defense Forces said Monday morning that its ground troops and special forces are "continuing to operate" in the western part of Khan Younis, a city in the southern Gaza Strip.

Read more about the Israel-Hamas conflict at: trib.al/T0PSMMS

item.title: 喜剧演员艾米-舒默（Amy Schumer）回击了对她外貌的评论，鼓励人们关注她的作品，并了解一种普遍存在的女性健康问题。
item.description: Comedian Amy Schumer is hitting back at comments about her looks, encouraging people instead to focus on her work and to educate themselves on a widespread women's health condition. trib.al/GJtB2TR

item.title: 最新消息警方称，印第安纳波利斯一家华夫饼屋发生枪击事件，造成至少一人死亡，五人受伤。
item.description: JUST IN: At least one person killed and five others injured in a shooting at a Waffle House in Indianapolis, police say. trib.al/hXy9ktO

item.title: 联邦数据显示，半数州以及纽约市和华盛顿特区的呼吸道病毒活动频繁。
item.description: Half of all states — plus New York City and Washington, D.C. — are seeing high levels of respiratory virus activity, according to federal data. trib.al/qGyPhAa

item.title: 当局称，英格兰西南部发现三名儿童死亡，一名妇女因涉嫌谋杀被捕。
item.description: Woman arrested on suspicion of murder after three children found dead in southwest England, authorities say. trib.al/OvWIIOp

item.title:
陆军中士的死揭开了他妻子和情人之间的秘密婚外情和谋杀阴谋。
@ABC2020探讨了2018年中士泰隆-哈塞尔三世（Tyrone Hassel III）的谋杀案：
item.description:
Army sergeant's death uncovers a secret affair and murder plot concocted by his wife and her lover.

@ABC2020 explores the 2018 murder of Sgt. Tyrone Hassel III: trib.al/Kx9uOyg

item.title: 自一年前吉米-卡特在佐治亚州南部的家中接受临终关怀以来，这位美国前总统已经度过了他的99岁生日，享受了对他的遗产的赞美，也失去了他结婚77年的妻子。
item.description: Since Jimmy Carter entered hospice care at his home in south Georgia one year ago, the former U.S. president has celebrated his 99th birthday, enjoyed tributes to his legacy and lost his wife of 77 years. trib.al/jtckdeZ

item.title: Vogue 公布了今年备受瞩目的 Met Gala 主题和明星联席主席。以下是我们对这一时尚界最盛大夜晚的了解：
item.description: Vogue has announced this year's highly anticipated Met Gala theme — and celebrity co-chairs. Here's what we know about fashion's biggest night: trib.al/51k0Igd

item.title: 酋长队四分卫帕特里克-马霍姆斯（Patrick Mahomes）和他的妻子布列塔尼（Brittany）看望了在酋长队超级碗游行中中弹住院的两姐妹。
item.description: Chiefs quarterback Patrick Mahomes and his wife, Brittany, visited two young sisters who are in the hospital after being shot at the Chiefs Super Bowl parade. trib.al/mZqeOWz

item.title: 罗德岛男子因涉嫌在以黑人为主的教堂纵火而面临联邦指控。
item.description: Rhode Island man faces federal charges for allegedly setting fires at predominantly Black church. trib.al/gmjv0tw

item.title: 由于野火肆虐，智利阿劳卡尼亚大区部分地区的居民周日被命令撤离。
item.description: Residents in parts of Chile’s Araucania region were ordered to evacuate on Sunday as wildfires raged.

item.title: 佛罗里达州的持续降雨和狂风促使纳斯卡官方将标志性的代托纳 500 赛事推迟到周一开始。
item.description: Steady rain and gusty winds in Florida prompted NASCAR to delay the start of the iconic Daytona 500 race until Monday, officials said. trib.al/C0abmDE

item.title: 当局告诉 @ABC 附属机构 @WSBTV 说，两名男子在佐治亚州一家加油站制造了一起抢劫案，企图偷走 5,000 美元，目前正面临重罪共谋指控。
item.description: Two men are facing felony conspiracy charges after they staged a robbery at a Georgia gas station in an attempt to steal $5,000, authorities told @ABC affiliate @WSBTV. trib.al/MGJmXH0

item.title: 官方称，周日在明尼苏达州伯恩斯维尔，两名警察和一名消防员在接到 "一个家庭处于危险之中的报警 "后被枪杀。
item.description: Two police officers and one firefighter were shot and killed in Burnsville, Minnesota, on Sunday after responding to a "call of a family in danger," officials say. trib.al/A3mCn7v

item.title:
宾夕法尼亚州州长乔希-夏皮罗（Josh Shapiro）是拜登总统的头号代言人之一，他告诉拜登的支持者，尽管民调结果令人担忧，但仍要开始为拜登的连任努力。
"我想对那些担心民调数字的人说：别再担心了 开始工作吧
item.description:
Pennsylvania Gov. Josh Shapiro, one of Pres. Biden's top surrogates, tells Biden supporters to start putting in the work to reelect him despite polling concerns.

"I would say to folks who are worried about the numbers: Stop worrying and start working." trib.al/FwcJjKh

item.title:
官员们说，一只名叫 Estrela 的狨猴被从南加州一户非法作为宠物饲养的家庭中救出后，正在奥克兰动物园享受生活。
动物园说，Estrela 的隔离期结束后，它将被转移到得克萨斯州的一个野生动物保护区。
item.description:
A marmoset named Estrela is enjoying life at the Oakland Zoo after being rescued from a home in Southern California where she was illegally kept as a pet, officials say.

After Estrela's quarantine period is over, she'll be moved to a wildlife sanctuary in Texas, the zoo says.

item.title: Charlamagne tha God 对 @JonKarl 说，"没有人受到 2024 年总统大选的启发"，"没有人愿意看到 "总统拜登和前总统特朗普之间可能进行的复选。
item.description: Charlamagne tha God told @JonKarl that "nobody is inspired" by the 2024 presidential election and "nobody wants to see" the likely rematch between Pres. Biden and former Pres. Trump. trib.al/3NJvshE
